org.sakaiproject.portal.charon.handlers

Class StaticHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.portal.charon.handlers.BasePortalHandler
      • org.sakaiproject.portal.charon.handlers.StaticHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortalHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StaticScriptsHandler, StaticStylesHandler

    public abstract class StaticHandler
extends BasePortalHandler
    Handler to process static content with an internal, in memory cache. Care should be taken not to put large volumes of static content within the portal space that is handled by this Handler as it will lead to increased memory usage.
    Since:
    Sakai 2.4
    Version:
    $Rev: 105079 $
    Author:
    ieb
